greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Number of children node n has in the tree defined by edge relation A255131(child) = parent, "the least squares beanstalk".
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 0..10000
formula: a(n) = Sum_{i=0..4} [A002828(n+i) = i]. (Here [ ] is Iverson-bracket, giving as its result 1 only if A002828(n+i) is i, otherwise zero.)
program: (Scheme) (define (A278216 n) (let loop ((s 0) (k (+ 4 n))) (if (< k n) s (loop (+ s (if (= n (A255131 k)) 1 0)) (- k 1)))))
xref: Cf. A278490 (positions of zeros), A278489 (positions of nonzeros), A278491 (positions of 4's).
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Nov 25 2016
